Package com.webcheckers.model.Board

Class Space

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.webcheckers.model.Board.Space

  • public class Space
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the Space object to represent a space on the board.

    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    couchcoders
